title: Development finance system needs urgent reforms, more money, to stave off disaster - public, private groups - Reuters.com
content: Development finance system needs urgent reforms, more money, to stave off disaster - public, private groups  Reuters.com
description: The global development finance system needs urgent reforms and far more private capital to address the multiple, overlapping crises that are pushing 250 million people back into extreme poverty, major public and private groups said in a statement.
